name: Custom Birthday Crown
description:
•CUSTOM BIRTHDAY CROWN•

•DESCRIPTION• 
The perfect accessory for every prince or princess on their special day!  Constructed with double layers of felt and completely customizable, this crown will last long beyond the birthday celebration and makes a great addition to the dress up collection as well.

•DETAILS• 
Measure approximately 7" tall at the heighest peak and 24" long when layed out flat.   
Choose your colors for the inside and outside pieces as well as the cupcake topping and candle colors!   
Constructed with high quality 100% eco-fi felt. 
Appliques are heat set and then stitched for durability. 
3" velcro closure. 
Spot Clean.

•EXTRAS•
This size crown fits most kids because of the extra long velcro but if your concerned about fit please be sure to measure your childs noggin and let me know so I can adjust accordingly!

•Be sure to leave me a note at checkout with the following info: 
Inside Crown Color
Outside Crown Color
Candle Base Colors
Cupcake Topping Color

•For available color options:
http://www.flickr.com/photos/playfultable/5017682277/
http://www.flickr.com/photos/playfultable/5017682185/

•SHIPPING• 
►This item ships flat via USPS First Class Mail.◄

Orders weighing less than 13oz will ship via USPS First Class Mail. 
Single or combined orders weighing more than 13oz will ship via USPS Priority Mail.

name: Bean Bag Balls - Set of 3 {Circus}
description:
Bean Bag Balls

Another back to basics toy! These brightly colored, tossable, squishable lightweight balls are easy to grip and just plain fun! Perfect for a game of catch, juggling or bean bag games. 

DETAILS:
•Set includes 3 bean bag balls. 
•Latex outer shell.
•Filled with small dried lentils. 
•Balls measure approx. 7 inches in diameter.

Colors for this set are as pictured but most color combinations can be accomodated. Convo me for details.

This toy contains latex and is not suitable for children with latex allergies. Please be sure to monitor small children when playing with this and any other toy. Bean bag Balls are not meant to be chew toys!
